source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT h.SalesOrderID, d.salesorderdetailid, h.SalesOrderNumber, h.PurchaseOrderNumber, h.AccountNumber,  h.OrderDate, h.DueDate, h.ShipDate,
   h.CustomerId, c.firstname + c.lastname AS CustomerName, h.ShipToAddressID, h.BillToAddressID,  d.ProductID, p.Name ProductName, p.ProductNumber, d.UnitPrice, d.LineTotal  
  FROM [SalesLT].[SalesOrderHeader] h 
  JOIN [SalesLT].[SalesOrderDetail] d  ON h.SalesOrderID=d.SalesOrderId
  LEFT JOIN [SalesLT].[Customer] c ON c.CustomerID=h.CustomerID
  LEFT JOIN [SalesLT].Product p ON p.ProductID=d.ProductID
